Your Quarterly Notes From Justia Elevate 

Welcome to your quarterly updates from Justia Elevate, our customized platform designed to create websites that work for lawyers.

Be sure to check out this email for information on recent updates we’ve made to the Justia Elevate platform, new design and feature options available for your site, and the latest informative guides from the Justia Elevate Help Center and Knowledge Base.

What's New in Design

New design options are now available for several stripes: Case Results, Practice Areas, Attorneys, Addresses, Videos, Forms, Footers, and Client Reviews! If you'd like to refresh the look and feel of your stripes, it's easy! Just click here to view your options and get started.

Six new sample websites are available in our design gallery! If you are interested in changing your design theme or adjusting your website elements, check out the newly added designs here.

Justia Elevate Platform Updates

Justia Elevate Platform Updates

The Justia Elevate platform was updated to incorporate improvements and upgrades for your site’s PageSpeed, reviews, and schema, among others, that enhance the overall usability of the Justia Elevate platform.

Your Premium Yoast SEO Was Updated

Your Yoast SEO plugin had a complete overhaul! The new interface is designed to enhance the user experience and facilitate finding and using its features. To learn more about these upgrades, check out this post from Yoast. There were also inclusive language analysis improvements.

New Chats Integration

We added new integrations to the Justia Elevate platform that simplify the setup process for the Intaker, Kenect, and Podium chat platforms! Getting started with your chat integration is a simple, straightforward process. For more information, please read this resource.

Justia Elevate Help Center Updates

Check out the Justia Elevate Help Center to see these new and updated articles, as well as our other resources to help you continuously maximize your Justia Elevate website’s potential!
